description.p: Release: Silver

ul.li: Changed: UI now follows my own style that complements that of Adwaita, called Solo.
Changed: The syntax follows Markdown conventions where possible.
Fixed: The mobile UI has been fixed, back buttons should show up without issue.

description.p: Note: Your notes and notebooks are always saved in ~/.var/app/io.github.lainsce.Notejot when using the Flatpak. Happy notetaking!
Release: Beautiful Superstar

ul.li: Added: New Notes Grid view, access your notes in a grid.
Changed: UI colors were changed, and some UI parts now look more intuitive.
Fixed: Unordered list formatting.
Fixed: Some UI bugs.

description.p: Note: Your notes and notebooks are always saved in ~/.var/app/io.github.lainsce.Notejot when using the Flatpak. Happy notetaking!
Release: The Top 100 (3.3.3)

ul.li: Changed: UI now looks better layoutted, is an experiment.
Changed: Backend was changed to be more stable than the old one.

description.p: Note: Your notes and notebooks are always saved in ~/.var/app/io.github.lainsce.Notejot when using the Flatpak. Happy notetaking!
Release: The Top 100

ul.li: Changed: UI now looks better layoutted, is an experiment.
Changed: Backend was changed to be more stable than the old one.

description.p: Note: Your notes and notebooks are always saved in ~/.var/app/io.github.lainsce.Notejot when using the Flatpak. Happy notetaking!
Release: Pinned Notes

ul.li: Added: Notes can now be pinned and are shown separately from others.
Added: Note title styling from older versions is back.
Added: Note searchbar is now always visible.

description.p: Note: Your notes and notebooks are always saved in ~/.var/app/io.github.lainsce.Notejot when using the Flatpak. Happy notetaking!
Release: Usability Independence

ul.li: Fixed: many UI bugs were fixed, last but not least the notebook switcher and trash and also removing singluar notes from a notebook.

description.p: Note: Your notes and notebooks are always saved in ~/.var/app/io.github.lainsce.Notejot when using the Flatpak. Happy notetaking!
Release: Format But Don't Fail

ul.li: Fixed: formatting functions are the best they can be, plus minor fixes all around.

description.p: Note: Your notes and notebooks are always saved in ~/.var/app/io.github.lainsce.Notejot when using the Flatpak. Happy notetaking!
Release: Ready, Set, Go!

ul.li: Some UI design fixes, such as the notebook switcher being on the bottom instead of in the top.

description.p: Note: Your notes and notebooks are always saved in ~/.var/app/io.github.lainsce.Notejot when using the Flatpak. Happy notetaking!
Release: GTK4 and Ready!

ul.li: New UI
Using another widget to display note contents
Keyboard shortcuts for formatting

description.p: Note: Your notes and notebooks are always saved in ~/.var/app/io.github.lainsce.Notejot when using the Flatpak. Happy notetaking!
